relation: Great for these types of students
you will never feel unsafe in that school
many clubs art poetry computer games you name it and it might just be there
for all students no matter where you come from
many thing just go to student life to help find something interesting to do on campus
keep going when things are not in your favor and never give up on things you want the most

oakton community college is a school of change and say change because of the programs they offer to help make sure you stay on the right track and they help me have a better understanding on what i want in a career and thank them for that

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here It's hard to socialize here because everyone has their own cliques from high school... Actually it feels like I'm still in high school sometimes, but for the most part people here are very agreeable and polite. Also, amazing burgers hahaha. Am learning a lot Though some of the general education courses can become tedious, some teacher profoundly want you to walk away with at least a new grain of knowledge by the end of their lecture. Courses like World Mythology and General Physics are great to take if you're curious on how the world works behind the scenes. Login to rate or flag the reviews Christina from Evanston, IL 04/17/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 32 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Anyone. I have seen so many different types of people, culturally, socially, and age-wise. Anyone who isn't a snob
